About Me

I'm Chester and I'm a

By the way, my name is Chester John Oblido, I am 22 years old and I live in Barangay Aranjuez, Balasan, Iloilo. When I was in elementary , I studied here in Balasan Central Elementary School and when I was in high school, I studied here in Balasan National High school and now I am currently studying here at Northern Iloilo State University, College of Information Computing Studies and I am a graduating student. Father's name is romel oblido and my mother is elgie oblido and I have four siblings and I'm the fourth of our siblings. I'm working hard to finish my education so I can find a good job to help my parents.
